channel.title: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?
channel.description: hey i made my own custom cape item and i mean like i made the model right now its a mqo file so how do i get it bak into a .dat and be able to put it in runescape?

item.description:

how do i make custom items??? any1 help like the .datmaker and the whole bit

Read full topic

item.title: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

Not what i meant sorry, i have bad spelling and grammer. the file needs to be either a .dat (usual file type) or .obj, which my program like i said does that for me.

Read full topic

@cocoa wrote:

dragmagic:

hey i made my own custom cape item and i mean like i made the model right now its a mqo file so how do i get it bak into a .dat and be able to put it in runescape?

with a .datmaker … you’re not really that stupid?

item.source: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?

item.title: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

fail, that does nothing but make the id and name. you need to make the figure then convert the 3d file to .dat some programs allow you to do it with it. for example, i have a 3d program called blender. i made a simple axe in 30 minutes. it allows you to convert the file without difficlutly. then i simply archived it, and added it to the models (in the client). in the server source, you need to to item.cfg, and add the name, id number, and stats. then go to the item.java file, and choose which catagory it would go under. (for example if you made a bow, you would go to the bow id numbers and add that id). there ya go, you have added your very own completly custom item.

Read full topic
item.source: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?

item.title: I made my own custom cape item how i put in game?
item.dc:creator: @HopeScape HopeScape
item.description:
@HopeScape wrote:

if you want to enter your own items then you need to make a custom client.
At the moment thats the only way.
but anyone playing your server must have your client to play eles they wont be able to see the new items

Read full topic
